ygData.subject: Re: Fire and Cold Resist
ygData.msgSnippet: I think back when we were doing high dives off the rim of the lava crater outside the temple of sol ro I got my damage down to 12 with our top fire resist song
ygData.messageBody:
I think back when we were doing high dives off the rim of the lava
crater outside the temple of sol ro I got my damage down to 12 with our
top fire resist song and the resist fire buff.


On Wed, Dec 08/99, Lomack <lomack@...> wrote:
> From: Lomack <lomack@...>
>
> Ok well my bard isn't high enough for the Fire save buff songs but some
> friends of mine and I have a bet. We are trying to find out what the least
> amount of damage one can take from the Lava in Sol B is per tick.
